column3:
“First few hours: Very uplifting experience. You slowly feel that you are entering another plane of existence. You slowly feel as if you are having a very vivid dream of a memory. The strain brings back memories depending on the outside stimuli. In other words, if you listen to a certain song, you will have memories of the time when you first listened to that song. 
--Sight: Colors are very pleasant. Everything seems...”

“A very good Sativa with an incredibly long buzz. I smoked several bowls of this by myself and I was left having closed eye visuals and open eye visuals and had music playing in my head. I would not recommend it to beginners because I smoked it from a steamroller at one point and the high was super intense even for me.”
“awesome strain, perfect morning weed if you find yourself in a job that allows you to be creative”

“Had it once as a birthday gift and absolutely loved it. Sadly I can't find any seeds online. Please for the love of all that is holy, someone point me in the right direction. All I can find is federation seeds but I believe they are no longer operating. Send me a link peeps! Thanks!”
“Extremely uplifting. Your body is perfectly fine and seems unaffected. You become very mellow and feel very good in general. You do not lose control or anything like that.”
“a fantastic day time high, w very little body  high it leaves you still stuck in the chair w a fantastic head change”
“wow”
“This strain is good for those wake n bake tokers. Sativa strains is my cup of coffee”

“4.2/5 Smoked one bowl from medium sized bubbler. Effects were quick to onset. Mostly a head high that only marginally mellows the body. Very trippy and similar to other pure sativas such as Durban Poison. Despite this particular strains lower THC content the high is strong. As of right now the head is flying while the body waits.”
“One of my go to weeds always a great taste and silly giggly time”
“Delicious & potent! Love this strain from Infinite Wellness, it's hands down my favorite right now.”
“Almost no affect on body. I felt uplifted, had a sense of well-being, and felt no paranoia. It just made me feel good, but it did not mess me up or anything.”
“I really enjoyed the uplifting high. I felt creative, energized and relaxed. Need to pick up more.”
“perfect for drawing”
“This strain is good for those wake n bake tokers. Sativa strains is my cup of coffee”
“Head high.”
“One of my favorite strains. You can just feel your mood change. All a head high, giggly, and tastes even better.”
“I want some”
“Looks good, great mixer strain! Strong smell, and smokes well! Enjoy!”

“This weed is a pleasant high; I got little nugs on sale from my local dispensary and it was a great deal. I feel super creative when smoking this, I definitely organize my thoughts easier. This is a great one to smoke before work.”
“I had a great time with it :)”
“its pretty good”
